heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) (Amendment) (No. 11) Regulations
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 2) (amendment) (no 11) regulation

title: other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of
other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 

(No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended - 

(a) 

in paragraph (c) of Regulation 3A, by the insertion of “and, in the 
case of an event having a number of sessions per day, may include 
a number of persons per session” after “may include a number of 
person per day”, and 

(b) by the substitution of the Schedule to these Regulations for 

Schedule 3 to those Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [423] 3
text_norm: 2 health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no.2) regulation 2021 (s.i no 217 2021) amended - (a) paragraph (c) regulation 3a insertion case event number session per day may include number person per session may include number person per day (b) substitution schedule regulation schedule 3 regulation notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 20th august 2021 423 3

title: other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to 
make amendments to the list of “Scheduled Events” currently provided for under 
the Regulations, including a number of additional events. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [423] 9
